ygData.msgSnippet: Small Enchancement to this if the bards aren t near any other NPC that would get you is to use one of your colour stun spells in the combo. Easy way to solo
ygData.messageBody:
Small Enchancement to this if the bards aren't near any other NPC that would
get you is to use one of your colour stun spells in the combo.

Easy way to solo even the Ghoul Magi is to buff a pet up then just cycle
stuns while the pet rips a new one into the mob...

Just make sure the target is all on their own.

Although with the new entrance and dazzle times dd/stun/mes/dd/stun/mes nuke
combo's are certainly the way to tackle high level single mobs.

- Baels

> Eventually, all enchanters find out that their pet can't tank. I have
> developed a strategy which will prolong the life of our beloved pets and
> make our use of mana more efficient. However, this will only work if the
mob
> you are soloing is not one of those "cons blue but hits like a red" types.
> First, u tashan, then you do your Dot. Then, u wait for the pet to have
half
> hp, and then cast the big dd spell. This will draw the mob toward you.
Here
> is the most important part. You must begin running in a circle, hitting
jump
> every once in a while. The mob will chase u and hit u less then it woud if
u
> were standing in one place. While this is going on, your pet is getting
free
> hits on the mob and should quickly finish it. Note: as much as you'd want
> to, do NOT use debuffs other than tashan. You must cast your 3 spells
> quickly, before the pet gets so low on hp that the mob will finish it.
Once
> again, this will only work if the mob you are fighting is blue. You must
> have an open area to work with, I'd say at least 15ft radius. I am
currently
> using this one in Lavastorm and its very mana efficient. Good luck.
>
>
